Method Detail

requestClusterDelete

public void requestClusterDelete(String clusterId,
                                 String userId)
                          throws Exception
Request deletion of a given cluster that the user has permission to delete.

Parameters:
clusterId - Id of the cluster to delete.
userId - Id of the owner of the cluster, or the admin user id.
Throws:
Exception

changeExpireTime

public void changeExpireTime(String clusterId,
                             String userId,
                             long expireTime)
                      throws Exception
Changes expire time of a cluster. The new expire time has to be greater than the cluster create time, and the increment requested should be less than the step size, and new expire time should not be greater than the max duration defined in the template.

Parameters:
clusterId - cluster Id.
userId - user requesting the change.
expireTime - new expire time.
Throws:
Exception

getUserCluster

public Cluster getUserCluster(String clusterId,
                              String userId)
                       throws Exception
Get a specific cluster that the user has permission to get, or null if no such cluster exists.

Parameters:
clusterId - Id of the cluster to get.
userId - Id of the owner of the cluster, or the admin user id.
Returns:
Cluster with the id given and owned by the user given, or null if no such cluster exists.
Throws:
Exception

getAllUserClusters

public List<Cluster> getAllUserClusters(String userId)
                                 throws Exception
Get all the clusters that the user has permission to get.

Parameters:
userId - Id of the user.
Returns:
List of all clusters owned by the user, or list of all clusters if the user is the admin.
Throws:
Exception
